name: Score League: Soccer Club!
description:
The football league is just about to start. Do you want to be the best manager ever? The team is waiting for a new coach to boost their career to the stars.
Your goal is to be the best manager in the world of soccer sport. You will become a key piece in your players careers, they will become the new football stars.

But there is more to do in this clicker game! As a manager you will have to invest your money wisely, buy local teams at first and then buy the best ones. The crowd will sing your name along during the match! You have to build a strong strategy in order to make your football team the best! Tap and tap to succeed in the business!

Features of this football league manager game:

- Grow a top career as a soccer manager
- Coach your teams and lead them to reach the glory of victory. Your players will evolve in short time.
- Become a professional football manager and recruit and coach soccer stars for your team
- Collect all the money you can to buy upgrades and new buildings!
- Tap and tap on the screen of your mobile to gain more money and surprises!
- Donate part of your profits to get even more fiscal benefits!
- Share your achievements with your friends and compare your careers in this amazing clicker!

In this clicker game you won't get bored! The football league wants you! Are you good enough to become the best soccer manager ever?

Let's go and boost the ball to the maximum score in this clicker game!
